author: veithen
msg: Set an svn:externals property to define the structure of the site under http://axis.apache.org/axis2/java.

author: ihabunek
msg: Changed a config file used in LoggerConfiguratorIniTest so that it won't create test log files in /tmp, but in <log4php>/target/temp. Otherwise, when testing on Windows, <drive>:\tmp gets created which is not desirable.

author: veithen
msg: Created a site directory under axis2/java. The purpose is to use SVN externals to define the site structure for the Axis2/Java subprojects and to have a place to manage an .htaccess file defining redirections.
